dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev really emphasized Slovakia as a key partner for Kazakhstan in Europe, calling them an important and reliable ally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev really emphasized Slovakia as a key partner for Kazakhstan in Europe, calling them an important and reliable ally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev emphasized that Slovakia is an important and reliable partner of Kazakhstan in Europe and one of the most active and dynamically developing EU member states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he specifically praised Robert Fico's leadership, saying many of Slovakia's achievements reflect his strong guidance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he specifically praised Robert Fico's leadership, saying many of Slovakia's achievements reflect his strong guidance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Many of these achievements reflect your strong leadership at the helm of your government.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting, um, how he highlighted their trade relationship too—last year, trade turnover reached $140 million between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting, um, how he highlighted their trade relationship too-last year, trade turnover reached one hundred forty dollars million between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year, trade turnover between the two countries amounted to $140 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And with over 30 Slovak companies operating in Kazakhstan, it's clear there's a solid economic connection already in place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with over thirty Slovak companies operating in Kazakhstan, it's clear there's a solid economic connection already in place.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 30 Slovak companies and 22 joint ventures operate in Kazakhstan across various sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But Tokayev wants to go further, right? He mentioned diversifying into areas like energy, agriculture, even digitalization.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Tokayev wants to go further, right? He mentioned diversifying into areas like energy, agriculture, even digitalization.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He pointed out new opportunities in energy, industrial production, agriculture, logistics, digitalization, critical raw materials, education, and tourism.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and Fico's response was pretty heartfelt too—he thanked Kazakhstan for their role in liberating Slovakia back in World War II.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and Fico's response was pretty heartfelt too-he thanked Kazakhstan for their role in liberating Slovakia back in World War I I.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From the bottom of my heart, I thank Kazakhstan for its invaluable contribution to the liberation of Slovakia in 1944"1945.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that part was striking—he mentioned around 60,000 Soviet soldiers, many from Kazakhstan, gave their lives for Slovakia's freedom.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that part was striking-he mentioned around sixty thousand Soviet soldiers, many from Kazakhstan, gave their lives for Slovakia's freedom.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: About one million soldiers from your country fought in the ranks of the Soviet Army. Around 60,000 Soviet soldiers gave their lives for Slovakia's liberation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It adds this historical depth to their modern partnership, which I think is really meaningful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It adds this historical depth to their modern partnership, which I think is really meaningful.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Fico seems to respect Tokayev's vision for a Just and Prosperous Kazakhstan—he even urged the EU to look beyond internal issues and learn from other nations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Fico seems to respect Tokayev's vision for a Just and Prosperous Kazakhstan-he even urged the E U to look beyond internal issues and learn from other nations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Your Excellency, we follow your efforts to develop the country and your ambitious vision for building a new Just and Prosperous Kazakhstan with great respect. I constantly urge my colleagues in the European Union not to focus solely on internal EU matters but to take a broader view of the world, learn from the experiences and achievements of other nations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is uh, a pretty diplomatic way of saying Europe shouldn't be so inward-focused.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is uh, a pretty diplomatic way of saying Europe shouldn't be so inward-focused.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Both sides confirmed mutual interest in strengthening ties and launching new initiatives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Both sides confirmed mutual interest in strengthening ties and launching new initiatives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the extended meeting between the two countries' delegations, both sides confirmed their mutual interest in further strengthening the partnership and implementing new initiatives aimed at developing Kazakh-Slovak relations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So it sounds like this wasn't just symbolic—there's real intent to deepen cooperation across multiple fronts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it sounds like this wasn't just symbolic-there's real intent to deepen cooperation across multiple fronts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: From politics to economics to even humanitarian exchanges, they're committed to making this partnership work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: From politics to economics to even humanitarian exchanges, they're committed to making this partnership work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I greatly value our strengthening political dialogue, the development of economic cooperation, humanitarian exchanges, and effective multilateral collaboration, President Tokayev said during the meeting at Akorda.
